DomainName.description: The unique name of the domain.

CalculatedAttributeName.description: The unique name of the calculated attribute.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the calculated attribute.

Description.description: The description of the calculated attribute.

AttributeName.description: The name of an attribute defined in a profile object type.

AttributeItem.description: The details of a single attribute item specified in the mathematical expression.

AttributeList.description: A list of attribute items specified in the mathematical expression.

Expression.description: Mathematical expression that is performed on attribute items provided in the attribute list. Each element in the expression should follow the structure of "{ObjectTypeName.AttributeName}".

AttributeDetails.description: Mathematical expression and a list of attribute items specified in that expression.

RangeValue.description: The amount of time of the specified unit.

Range.description: The relative time period over which data is included in the aggregation.

ObjectCount.description: The number of profile objects used for the calculated attribute.

Threshold.description: The threshold for the calculated attribute.

Conditions.description: The conditions including range, object count, and threshold for the calculated attribute.

Statistic.description: The aggregation operation to perform for the calculated attribute.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

resource.description: A calculated attribute definition for Customer Profiles

attributes.description: A calculated attribute definition for Customer Profiles

properties.name: CreatedAt
properties.description: The timestamp of when the calculated attribute definition was created.

type.description: The timestamp of when the calculated attribute definition was created.

properties.name: LastUpdatedAt
properties.description: The timestamp of when the calculated attribute definition was most recently edited.

type.description: The timestamp of when the calculated attribute definition was most recently edited.
